 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homework043', templateUrl: './homework043.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homework043.component.css'], }) export class Homework043Component { showPassword = false; secretPassword = 'tuna'; displayDetails() { this.showPassword ? false : true; } }
